## Source: ossf-package-analysis (efafe7e60f7bde7ddddd2cdd0c5464da613f467cef65d985b5984f75a323a349)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@apps-common/ui-theme' @ 10.1.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
